meanings.definition: Carefully choose as being the best or most suitable.
meanings.sent1: I will select the ripest apple from the tree.
meanings.sent2: She likes to select her outfit the night before.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to select the comfiest spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: He had to select the right tool for the job like a skilled craftsman.
meanings.sent5: The chef will select the freshest ingredients for the dish.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things that have been chosen from a larger number.
meanings.sent1: The elite group is a select few who have access to the exclusive club.
meanings.sent2: The select committee will review the proposals.
meanings.sent3: The select team of scientists worked on the top-secret project.
meanings.sent4: The select players made it to the finals after a tough competition.
meanings.sent5: The select artworks were displayed in the prestigious gallery.
